AltName.entry: TURNING POINT - ROCKINGHAM DRUG PROJECT (FORMER NAME)

Desc.entry: A registered charity that offers free and confidential services for anyone affected by their own or someone else's illegal drug use. The service is open to anyone aged 18 years and over living in Sheffield and offers a drop-in service, counselling in group and one-to-one sessions, needle exchange, nurse's drop-in clinic and outreach work. Self or any referral.

ContactName.entry: Alison Powell, Service Manager/Andy Dudley/Mick Holmes

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 9am-5pm (office hours); Mon-Fri 9am-5pm (needle exchange), 11am-4.30pm (drop-in), evening appointments by arrangement, 1pm (ear accupuncture), 1-2pm (general accupuncture), 2-5pm (complementary therapies by appointment); Mon, Wed & Fri (healthcare & vaccinations)
